item.title: issue-001-docs-navigation-naming
item.description: ISSUE-001: “Docs” Appearing as Navigation Name Instead of Repository Names Status: ✅ RESOLVED Priority: High Created: 2025-12-19 Last Updated: 2025-12-19 Resolved: 2025-12-19 Additional Fix: 2025-12-19 (nested docs directories) Problem Statement The Hugo navigation sidebar shows “Docs” as the section name instead of the repository name. This creates confusing, nested “Docs > Docs > Docs” hierarchies instead of meaningful navigation like “Repository-Name > Documentation”.
